## ResolutionTools.IResolutionResult interface

Result of attempting to resolve a specific resource with a given context. Contains the resolved value, matching candidates, and diagnostic information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IResolutionResult<T = unknown, TV extends JsonCompatible<T> = JsonCompatible<T>> 
```
